attr.value: Port. Dúnadan factions playable at sites in Bay of Ormal territory may be placed under Sentinels of Númenor (as if playable at sites in Gondor).
Information, Items (minor, major, greater*) *—non-battle-gear items only—
Dúnedain — 4 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Port. Tap a Dúnadan or Ringwraith in Heralded Lord mode to discard Sentinels of Númenor from this site.

card.name: Aknazeh
card.text: Unique. Can use shadow-magic. +2 EI against the Sons of Sâdeh faction. Wound Akhazek to let him use sorcery until the end of the turn (no body check required).

card.name: Anarikanî
card.text: Unique. Playable at any port site in Kythor or Olyas Kriis if the influence check is greater than 9.Standard modifications: Dúnedain (+2), Dwarves (+1), Elves (+1) tap: bring one Sons of Kings or a Dúnadan character with a home site in Bay of Ormal or the Sun-lands from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle).

card.name: Aransiros the Sublime
card.text: Unique. Can use sorcery. +2 EI against the Múranians faction. If Aransiros controlls a unique mind ring he becomes a War-lord.

card.name: Ashmaar
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against characters and factions playable in Chy or its adjacent regions. -1 to his CC if not at or moving to a site in Bay of Ormal, the Great Central Plains or the Sun-lands.

attr.value: Dwarves — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment; cancelled if the company contains a Dwarf)
Hidden site. Unless the company contains an Ironfist Dwarf, tap a sage or a Dwarf to move to this site.
Hidden site. Unless the company contains an Iron-fist Dwarf, tap a sage or a Dwarf to move to this site.

card.name: Bahadur
card.text: Unique. Stiffbeard. +1 prowess against Orcs, Trolls and Giants. tap: and discard a (stored) Reforging from the company to make Dwarven Light-stone playable at his current Dwarf-hold until the end of the turn.

card.name: Chyans
card.text: Unique. Playable at Pelepelplû if the influence check is greater then 8. Standard Modifications: Men (+1), Nomads of Clyan (+2). As a minion resource only playable by a covert company. tap: allow a hero or covert company to play one Noble Steed, Mighty Steed, Zûrafy or Wild Horses at any Free-hold [F] or Border-hold [B] site in Chy.

attr.value: Opponent may play a non-unique Elf or Dúnadan creature with an asterix (*) from his hand or discard pile as an automatic-attack (detainment)
(1st) Men — 4 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack a non-unique Elf or Dúnadan creature with an asterix (*) from his hand or discard pile

card.name: City Guard of Tenolkachyn
card.text: Unique. Playable at Tenolkachyn if the influence check is greater than 10.

card.name: Dâiruzôr
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against The Khanîm faction and The Dark Ordainers. +2 prowess in CvCC if choosing the target of his strike.

attr.value: Port. The Kuorind faction may be brought into play at this site: any influence attempt against this faction at this site is modified by -3.
Dúnedain — each character faces a strike with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

card.name: Eärmacil II
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Dúnedain.

card.name: Elinse
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Dúnadan-hold or Man-hold in Bulchyades or Olyas Kriis if the influence check is greater than 8 Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (+2), Anarikanî (+2) As a minion resource only playable by a covert company.

attr.value: Make a roll during the organization phase: any Stiffbeard Dwarf with a mind equal to or lower than the roll may be brought into play at this site and may be played from the discard pile.

card.name: Giants of the Ered Harmal
card.text: Unique. Playable at any non-Haven [H] site in Ered Harmal, if you discard (for no effect) a food item from the company and if the influence check is greater than 10 tap: and discard a Giant creature from hand to make non-unique ore items playable at sites in Ered Harmal until the end of the turn.

card.name: Gorshûk
card.text: Unique. Uruk-hai. Leader. Discard on a body check result of 8. +1 prowess against Orcs. +1 EI against Orcs. +2 EI against the Ogurk-bâsh faction. You may play Orc-tortured on any strike Gorshûk faces in CvCC during your turn (before rolls are made; as if an Orc creature attack).

attr.value: Information, Items (minor, major, greater, gold ring)
(1st) Dúnedain — each character faces a strike with 8 prowess; (2nd) Dúnedain — 4 strikes with 9 prowess
Port. A minion company may not attack another company at this site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site. An overt must tap a ranger or scout to move to this site.
Rock Fall — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess*
*need only be faced if the company has moved to the site the same turn. +2 to any influence attempt against the Nomads of Clyan faction at this site.
Rock Fall — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess*
*need only be faced if the company has moved to the site the same turn. +2 to any influence attempt against the Nomads of Clyan faction at this site.

card.name: Kabadir
card.text: Unique. If at or moving to a site in Chy, Harshandatt, Siakan or regions adjacent to these: +1 to his prowess and EI and he becomes a leader.

attr.value: Orcs — 4 strikes with 6 prowess (detainment against overt companies)
Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.

card.name: Khursh
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against the Chyans faction.

card.name: Kuorind
card.text: Unique. Playable at Lómeanor if the influence check is greater than 9 Standard Modifications: Silvan Tatya Elves (+2), Dúnedain (+1)

card.name: Lyharg
card.text: Wolf. Playable at any tapped or untapped Ruins & Lairs [R] or Shadow-hold [S] in a Desert [e] or Shadow-land [s] region in Bay of Ormal or the Sun-lands. +1 prowess when at or moving to a site in a Desert region. When the company moves through a Desert [e] region, each Lyharg in the company increases the maximum of regions the company may move by 1.

card.name: Lynír
card.text: Unique. Playable at Cirlond or Ephydis if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Dundedain (+1), Stiffbeard Dwarves (+1), character with home site in Bay of Ormal (+1). You may store ore resources at sites in Lyneria. This faction is worth +1 MP for each ore resource stored at a site in Lyneria (to a maximum of 4).

card.name: Merkampa
card.text: Unique. May be played at Poison Rock. Cold-Dragon. 3 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to Chy, Clyan, Heb Aaraan, Orgothraath and Siakan; may also be played at non-Haven [H] sites in these regions

card.name: Merkampa Ahunt
card.text: Unique. Any company moving in Chy, Clyan, Heb Aaraan, Orgothraath and/or Siakan immediately faces a Cold-Dragon attack (considered a hazard creature attack) — 4 strikes at 12/7 (attacker chooses defending characters). If Doors of Night is in play, this attack also affects:Arisis, Chey Sart and Ered Harmal.

card.name: Merkampa at Home
card.text: Unique. Unless Merkampa Ahunt is in play, Poison Rock has an additional automatic- attack: Cold-Dragon — 3 strikes at (attacker chooses defending characters). Aditionally, all influence attempts against Animal, Dragon and Drake factions are modified by -1.

card.name: Merkampa Roused
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Merkampa. Playable at Poison Rock if the influence attempt is greater than 12. Modifications: influencer discards a major item (+3) or a greater item (+6) All attacks by manifestations of Merkama against any of your companies are cancelled. Any company moving in Chy, Clyan, Heb Aaraan, Orgothraat and Siakan faces one attack: Cold-Dragon — 3 strikes with 14/8 prowess/body (attacker chooses defending characters)

card.name: Múranians
card.text: Unique. Playable at Naerphys if the influence check is greater than 9 Standard Modifications: Chyans (-2)

attr.value: Men — 5 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment unless the company contains an Elf)
Any non-unique mind ring may be played at this site from your hand or discard pile.
Men — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment against covert companies; +2 prowess against overt companies)
Any non-unique mind ring may be played at this site from your hand or discard pile.

card.name: Naga-Ûlurk
card.text: Unique. Playable at Quarries of Nosharud if the influence check is greater than 7 Standard Modifications: Ogurk-bâsh (-2), Giants of the Ered Harmal (-2) May also be played at tapped sites.

attr.value: Ancient Dwarf-ruin. Bulchyades; Olyas Kriis. Contains a hoard.
Ancient Dwarf-ruin. Bulchyades; Olyas Kriis. Contains a hoard.

card.name: Nevazar
card.text: Unique. Undead. 1 strike. Playable at Nevazar's Tomb. If Out of the Swamps is in play Nevazar may be played keyed to Chy. Additionally, if Doors of Night is in play he may played keyed to non-Free-hold [F] sites in Chy or its adjacent regions.

attr.value: (1st) Undead — 1 strike with 12 prowess; (2nd) Traps — 2 strikes with 8 prowess
Hidden site. When moving to this site a company must discard a Stolen Knowledge card it controls (or a Wondrous Maps). Contains a hoard.
(1st) Undead — 1 strike with 12 prowess; (2nd) Traps — 2 strikes with 8 prowess
Hidden site. When moving to this site a company must discard a Stolen Knowledge card it controls. Contains a hoard.

card.name: Nomads of Clyan
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Border-hold [B] or Ruins & Lairs [R] in Clyan or its adjacent regions if the influence check is greater than 9.Standard Modifications: Chyans (+2), Variags (-3)Special: +2 to your faction battles in Clyan. tap: at any time to create an attack against an overt company moving through Clyan: Men — 5 strikes with 9 prowess. Any character or faction eliminated by this faction is placed under it instead of in the out-of-play pile. This faction is worh +1 mp (to a maximum of 3) for each card placed with it.

card.name: Númenór Perished
card.text: Your influence attempts against Man and Dúnadan factions at sites in Bay of Ormal are modified by +1 for every copy of The Dark Ordainers you have in play. This card is worth 1 mp for every 2 copies of The Dark Ordainers you have in play (round down). If this card is worth any mp, you receive full kill mp for defeated Dúnadan creatures and characters. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Ogurk-bâsh
card.text: Unique. Playable at Kala-Ogurk if the influence check is greater than 7 Standard Modifications: Naga-Ûlurk (-2), Giants of the Ered Harmal (-2)May also be played at tapped sites. +2 to your influence attempts against the Snaga-hai faction at sites in Ered Ormal.

attr.value: Dúnedain — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment)
Port. A company may not move with port movement to this site unless it taps (for no effect) a ranger.
Dúnedain — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Port. A company may not move with port movement to this site unless it taps (for no effect) a ranger.

card.name: Palantrist
card.text: Technology. Lost Knowledge. Transport. Playable at Port site if you have Profitable Trade taking effect on a faction there (tap the site if untapped). Place Palantrist with a company and/or faction at the site. It may use Port movement or region movement using Coastal Seas [c] without further requirement. Palantrist may be used as a site in Coastal Seas. Tap a character who has a port as a home site to fulfill the movement requirement of a site in a Coastal Seas [c]. You receive this card’s mp if you have a faction with it affected by Númenór’s Legacy.

attr.value: *If a Traveling Merchants faction is placed with the company, items at this site may be played from your discard pile or sideboard.
If you are Akhôrahil and have a unique faction at this site, Cult of the Dark Lord is playable at this site as if it where Umbar.
Tap an ally or faction with the flying abiltiy at this site to look at opponent's hand,if opponent has a company or faction in play in Bay of Ormal, Great Central Plains or the Sun-lands.
Tap an ally or faction with the flying abiltiy at this site to look at opponent's hand,if opponent has a company or faction in play in Bay of Ormal, Great Central Plains or the Sun-lands.

card.name: Psousèn the Valorous
card.text: Unique. Leader. +2 prowess against Nazgûl and magic users. +2 EI against Man characters and factions playable at sites in Chy or its adjacent regions. Unless he is among the starting characters he may only be brought into play at his home site. Wizard’s Pupil may be played on Psousèn. Discard Psousèn if in a company with any overt character or if you have Bad Company in play.

attr.value: (1st) Rock Fall — 2 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Giant — 1 strike with 12 prowess
(1st) Rock Fall — 2 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Giant — 1 strike with 12 prowess

card.name: Relin
card.text: Unique. Stiffbeard. +2 EI against Ironfist and Stiffbeard Dwarves. +1 prowess against Orcs and Giants. If Relin bears Dwarven Ring of Bávor’s Tribe: +1 to all his CC, he becomes a leader and gains the sage skill.

attr.value: Tap a diplomat to make Chyans playable at this site: +2 to the influence attempt.
Men — 3 strikes with 6 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Tap a diplomat to make Chyans playable at this site: +2 to the influence attempt.

card.name: Sons of Sâdeh
card.text: Unique. Playable at Valley of Tombs if the influence check is greater than 9Standard Modifications: magic-using character (+2), overt character (-2)

card.name: Tâmpac
card.text: Animal. 2 strikes. Playable keyed to any non-Free-domain [f], non-Coastal-sea [c] region in Bay of Ormal. Detainment. If a strike is successfull, any subsequent strikes become non-detainment.

attr.value: Dúnedain — 4 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment if the company contains only Dúnedain)
Air Spirits — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment)
Any Here There or Yonder played by a Wizard or Dúnadan character to bring Lindion the Oronín or an eagle ally into play at this site is automatically successful.
Air Spirits — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess

(1st) Men — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies);(2nd) opponent may play any man creature with an asterix (*) from his hand or discard pile as a 2nd automatic-attack.
(1st) Traps — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) opponent may play from hand as a second automatic-attack a creature normally keyable to Shadow-holds [S]

card.name: The Dark Ordainers
card.text: Playable on a Man or Dúnadan-hold in Bay of Ormal. Tapan avatar or Dúnadan at the site and make a roll (considered an influence attempt), modified by +2 if on a Border-hold [B], +4 if on a Shadow-hold [S] and +2 for each copy of The Dark Ordainers in play; if the result is greater than 11 tap the site if untapped, otherwise discard this card. The site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. Discard this card to take a resource playable on the site or on a character at the site or a Slayer hazard creature from your discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated on a given site. You may have up to 9 copies of this card in your play deck and sideboard combined.

card.name: The Khanîm
card.text: Unique. Playable at XXX if the influence check is greater than 12.Standard modifications: Cult of Mulker (+4), Elves (-4), Dwarves (-2), Men (-2), any overt character (-3). tap play Mornaturi from your sideboard.

attr.value: Quarries of Nosharud (0), Azagarbhun (5), The Amber-deeps (6), The Lava-deeps (5), The Brass-deeps (7)
(1st) Spiders — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyable to a Shadow-hold [S].

card.name: Three Tears of Manah
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at any Ruins & Lairs [R] in Bay of Ormal or Ered Harmal, if the company has faced a Giant attack the same turn. Discard this item to make an influence attempt against a faction at a site in Chy, Clyan, or regions adjacent to these automatically succesful; you may bring a character with a home site in these regions into play under EI or GI at the site of the influence attempt, and such character may be taken from your discard pile.

attr.value: Opponent may play as an automatic-attack from his hand, play deck or discard pile one creature with an asterix (*) keyed to Free-holds [F].
Information, Items (minor, major, greater, gold ring)

(1st) Traps — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Slayers — 2 strikes with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters)

Hidden site. Discard an Interrogation or Seized Prisoners from the company to move to this site. Contains a hoard.

card.name: Varadir
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess if Enduring Tales is in play. +2 EI against non-unique Dúnadan or Man characters. tap: play Gift of Comprehension on any character in his company without further requirements (+1 to his CC if played on himself); it may also be played from your discard pile.

card.name: Vishtâspa
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against characters and factions only playable at sites in Chy or its adjacent regions. Discard Engines of Defense from hand or his current site to cancel CvCC against his company.

card.name: Vulmaw Sea-traders
card.text: Playable at any tapped or untapped Port sitein Bay of Ormal if the influence check is greater than 9Standard Modifications: discard an item from the company (+3).As a minion resource only playable by a covert company. Counts as any race for the purpose of Profitable Trade.

attr.value: (1st) Animals (Vuk) — 3 strikes with 6 prowess; (2nd)* Orcs — 3 strikes with 8 prowess
This site is considered a Shadow-hold [S] if Drought is in play. *Must only be faced if this site is a Shadow-hold.

This site is considered a Shadow-hold [S] if Drought is in play.*Must only be faced if this site is a Shadow-hold. Non-Nazgûl creatures keyed to this site attack normally, not as detainment.
A Wose character may tap at this site to make any minor item with a healing effect playable at this site from your sideboard.
Woses — 4 strikes with 8 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters unless the company contains a Wose)
A Wose character may tap at this site to make any minor item with a healing effect playable at this site from your sideboard.

card.name: Yatali-Gan
card.text: Unique. Playable at any site in Sára Bask if the influence check is greater than 9Standard Modifications: Woses (+2) You may play Poison as a hero item.

card.name: Zurghîr Menace
card.text: Any company moving in Khytor or Ered Ormal faces two attacks: Orcs — 4 strikes with 7 prowess; Men — 3 strikes with 8 prowess.
